JavaScript基礎演習.title: JavaScript Basic Course
JavaScript基礎演習.description: Beginner-friendly JavaScript programming fundamentals course. Learn step by step from JavaScript basics to DOM manipulation, async processing, and external API integration through 15 weeks of practical exercises.

JavaScript基礎.title: JavaScript Basics
JavaScript基礎.description: JavaScript basic syntax, conditionals, arrays, loops, functions

DOM操作.title: DOM Manipulation
DOM操作.description: Get and manipulate DOM elements, event handling, create/add/remove elements
deliverables: Dynamically create, add, and remove elements

中間評価と復習.title: Midterm Evaluation and Review
中間評価と復習.description: Comprehensive review of Weeks 1-7 and midterm evaluation

データ管理と非同期処理.title: Data Management and Async Processing
データ管理と非同期処理.description: WebStorage, JSON, asynchronous processing, external API integration

総合課題.title: Comprehensive Project
総合課題.description: Comprehensive web application development using all learned content
deliverables: Integrate and apply all learned content

第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.title: Week 1: JavaScript Basics and Conditionals
第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.description: JavaScript basic syntax, variables, data types, operators, if statements, switch statements

第2週：配列・ループ・関数.title: Week 2: Arrays, Loops, Functions
第2週：配列・ループ・関数.description: Array operations, for loops, while loops, function definition and calling

第3週：DOM.title: Week 3: DOM
第3週：DOM.description: DOM (Document Object Model) basics, getting and manipulating elements

第4週：イベント処理.title: Week 4: Event Handling
第4週：イベント処理.description: Event listeners, event types, event objects

第5週：ループとイベント.title: Week 5: Loops and Events
第5週：ループとイベント.description: Combining loops with events, dynamic element handling

第6週：Elementの作成・追加.title: Week 6: Element Creation and Addition
第6週：Elementの作成・追加.description: createElement, appendChild, insertBefore, dynamic content creation

第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.title: Week 7: Element Removal and Events on Dynamic Elements
第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.description: removeChild, event delegation, handling dynamic elements

第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.title: Week 8: Reserve Day (Midterm Evaluation Week)
第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.description: Comprehensive review of Weeks 1-7 and midterm assignment

第9週：WebStorageの利用.title: Week 9: Using WebStorage
第9週：WebStorageの利用.description: Data persistence with localStorage and sessionStorage

第10週：JSONについて.title: Week 10: About JSON
第10週：JSONについて.description: JSON format, stringify, parse, data exchange

第11週：非同期処理・タイマー関数.title: Week 11: Async Processing and Timer Functions

第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.title: Week 12: External APIs and Async Communication
第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.description: Fetch API, REST APIs, handling API responses
